name: Orkana Conflict Quest2
description:
IMPORTANT !   "ORKANA is ONLY FOR QUEST 2 " PLEASE BUY ONLY FOR QUEST 2.

FEATURE:  VR RTS - Shooter MIX

- Mix of first person perspective(shooter) and 3rd person strategy game.-

- Orkana is RTS + Shooter and so is interesting for strategy and non strategy players.

- 5 missions with many hours of gameplay.each mission represents a territory to conquer.

- fight side by side with your army , direct fire at you when attacking enemy buildings or clusters of tanks to protect your army.

- simple basic RTS building game with base, houses, barracks, vehicle factory, tech buildings and units.... build tanks, soldiers, various vehicles and stand up to mutant orcs, enemy vehicles and creatures.

- as you level up, Orkana offers new units, new enemies, new buildings, new items in each mission.

- Ministory that is advanced during the missions.

- Missions in English and German

- bonus Map added.

More info also is on Steam.

German:

VR RTS - Shooter MIX

WICHTIG ! " ORKANA ist NUR FÜR QUEST 2 " BITTE NUR FÜR QUEST 2 KAUFEN. - Mix aus First-Person Ego-Perspektive(Shooter) und 3.Person Strategie Spiel.

- Orkana ist RTS + Shooter und ist so für Strategie und nicht Strategie Spieler interessant.

- 5 Missionen mit vielen Stunden Spielzeit.Jede Mission stellt ein zu eroberndes Gebiet dar.

- kämpfe Seite an Seite mit deiner Armee , lenke bei einem Angriff auf feindliche Gebäude oder Ansammlungen von Panzern das Feuer auf dich um deine Armee zu schützen.

- einfache Grundausstattung eines RTS Aufbauspieles mit Basis, Häuser, Kaserne, Fahrzeugfabrik, Techgebäude und Einheiten.

- baue Panzer, Soldaten, verschiedene Fahrzeuge und biete den Mutanten-Orks, Feindfahrzeugen und Kreaturen die Stirn.

- mit steigendem Level bietet Orkana in jeder Mission neue Einheiten, neue Feinde, neue Gebäude, neue Gegenstände.

- Ministory, die im Verlauf der Missionen vorangetrieben wird.

- Missionen in Deutsch und Englisch

- Bonus Map hinzugefügt

- Mehr infos auch Bei Steam

Story:

Main Story:

We are in a distant future and you take the role of a commander of the Earth fleet.

Deployed on the planet Orkana, we are asked to advance the mining of raw materials and to manage the security of the territory.

In the course of the mission it soon becomes clear that the planet is not uninhabited and that an evil force apparently has control over the living creatures.

As it seems, the conquest of the territories is prevented by a ruthless enemy.

Thus, it will be your task as the commander of the force to bring this enemy to its knees and bring the planet and its resources into the possession of mankind.

Decide the conflict on Orkana for us and conquer the planet for mankind.

Gameplay:

Orkana Conflict VR combines and combines here for the first time the typical "3RD person perspective" with the "first-person first-person perspective".

You mine resources, create various buildings and units like in a typical RTS game, and command them from the air.

But then you'll also have to actively play in the first-person mode yourself, in order to ensure the progress of your army or enable it to overcome an obstacle, in order to ultimately defeat the vicious enemy.

Orkana Conflict does not aim to create the depth of a full-fledged RTS game in this regard.

There is no deeper upgrade system or hours of base building or mass battles with hundreds of units.

Instead, the focus is on a small 20-27 man army that should be used tactically smart to overcome the obstacles together with the player and win the territory of the enemy for themselves.

Entwicklung/Development

- Orkana Conflict ist ein ein Mann Projekt. Die gesamte Entwicklungszeit betrug ca. 2,5 Jahre.Ich hoffe es macht Spass.

- Orkana Conflict is a one man project. The total development time was about 2.5 years.I hope it's fun.
